channel.title: Cheat client
channel.description: what is a cheat client? do you need to build a all new client for this? how do you make one? is it just java codes? is it just a control panel? and how do i make this "client" to work for other servers?

item.title: Cheat client
item.dc:creator: @aaa805 aaa805
item.description:
@aaa805 wrote:

Kidpaparoach:

The solution to fixing this issue is allegedly (and it sounds correct) getting the source to check what the client sends to the source.

Indeed!, a common case is you can spoof interface clicks, say for auto tping to varrock when your attacked, this is pretty easy to code in, and would work no matter what tab you are on, because most servers don’t check what interface you actively have open, same with skill lamps etc

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat client
item.dc:creator: @aaa805 aaa805
item.description:
@aaa805 wrote:

Sup22211:

Thats not what i meant but never mind, i know you cant block the method…

You add additional code into a client that is compatible with the server.
Problem being, most servers seem to trust what ever the client sends them.

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat client
item.dc:creator: @error1a error1a
item.description:
@error1a wrote:

Cheat clients are client side… You can’t block packets… Then nobody would be able to play or even login

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat client
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

Before you logout, can you show me a quick example of how you code it? where is it client side/server side you code?
Edit: how can i block someone to use the packets method?

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat client
item.dc:creator: @error1a error1a
item.description:
@error1a wrote:

A cheat client sends client -> server packets telling the server that a certain action has happened (even though it hasn’t) for example clicking on an object. You can send a packet tellin the server you clicked on the certain object and since most servers don’t check to see of the objec is there it goes straight to the functions for clickkng said object.

No you do not need to make a whole new client. You can use any client that has been released.

To get a cheat client to work on servers you have to set your client to the server ip. And it’s all in java except for client interfaces and cache editing, but you shouldn’t have to worry about it.

Read full topic
